articles.title: Greetings to King of Bahrain
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Bahrain
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Sheikh Hamad Bin Isa al-Khalifa, King of Bahrain, on the occasion of its 47th national day.
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished him good health and happiness and the people of Bahrain greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets Egyptian Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Meets Egyptian Delegation
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Orascom Telecom Holding of Egypt headed by its Chairman and CEO Naguib Sawiris at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
					 On hand were Ryu Yong Sop, minister of Post and Telecommunications, officials concerned and Egyptian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Abdelrahman Ghoneim Hussein.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Egyptian Businessman
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Egyptian Businessman
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Chairman and CEO of the Orascom Telecom Holding of Egypt Naguib Sawiris on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was conveyed to Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, by Naguib Sawiris Monday.

articles.title: Egyptian Telecom Holding Here
articles.content:
Egyptian Telecom Holding Here
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Orascom Telecom Holding of Egypt headed by its Chairman and CEO Naguib Sawiris arrived here by air on Monday.

articles.title: First 3G Mobile Network Kicked Off
articles.content:
First 3G Mobile Network Kicked Off
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The First 3G Mobile Network was kicked off with due ceremony in Pyongyang on Monday.
					 Present there were Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Ryu Yong Sop, minister of Post and Telecommunication, and officials concerned and members of the delegation of the Orascom Telecom Holding of Egypt headed by its Chairman and CEO Naguib Sawiris and Ismail Abdelrahman Ghoneim Hussein, Egyptian ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Pak Myong Chol, director of the DPRK Post and Telecommunication Company, noted in a speech at the ceremony that the start of the above-said network provided an important occasion in developing the post and telecommunication of the country as required by the age of information industry.
					
					 He noted that the credit for the realization of the above-mentioned network goes to the positive efforts made by Naguib Sawiris to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Egypt.
					
					 He expressed the belief that cooperative relations between the DPRK Post and Telecommunication Company and the Orascom Telecom Holding of Egypt would grow stronger.
					
					 Naguib Sawiris in his congratulatory speech said that the Egyptian and Korean peoples have friendly and cooperative tradition.
					
					 Under the wise guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il the Korean people have achieved great successes despite difficulties, he said.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the Korean people would surely build a great prosperous powerful nation upholding the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the end of the event the participants went round the Center for Serving Subscribers. the Hand Phone Service Centre, etc.
					
					 Meanwhile, a press conference was held at the People's Palace of Culture on the same day in connection with the start of the above-said network.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets CPC Friendship Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets CPC Friendship Delegation
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Monday met and had a friendly talk with the friendship delegation of the Communist Party of China headed by Li Jiheng, deputy secretary of the Yunnan Provincial Committee of the CPC.
					 Li Jiheng said that the friendly relations between the two parties and two countries provided by revolutionaries of the elder generation are growing stronger under the deep care of Hu Jintao and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He noted that the party and the government of China feel thankful to the party and the government of the DPRK for extending support and encouragement to various events held in China including the 29th Olympic Games.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would register greater success in their work for developing economy and improving the standard of the people's living.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from CPC Friendship Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from CPC Friendship Delegation
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the friendship delegation of the Communist Party of China on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed to Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Monday by Li Jiheng, deputy secretary of the Yunnan Provincial Committee of the CPC who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Facelifted Central Zoo (2)
articles.content:
Facelifted Central Zoo (2)
Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The Central Zoo has been facelifted to meet the demand of the times and the desire of the people.
					The zoo which covers an area of more than a hundred hectares has completely changed its looks.
					
					It has been largely expanded in total plottage, floor space and playing area, compared with those before reconstruction. 
					
					The main entrance of the zoo has been rebuilt to look refreshing and dignified and the outdoor fountain pond arranged in a specific style to delight the visitors.
					
					The builders did their level best to render peculiar looks to the animal sheds so that the visitors could see a large number of rare animals from different parts of the world in a natural environment.
					
					The thickly wooded zoo has such service facilities as souvenir shop, restaurant and soft drink stands for the visitors.
					
					Thousands of meters long broad paved roads stretch in the compound and promenades to the animal sheds covered with color blocks extending tens of thousands of square meters are lined with white birch inherent to  the northern region and other species of trees and flower shrubs, converting the zoo into a park.
					
					The Central Zoo will take on a better appearance while consolidating its material and technical foundations under the care of the state.

articles.title: Fruitful Year in Education
articles.content:
Fruitful Year in Education
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- A fresh development has been made in the educational work of the DPRK this year when the 30th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's famous work "Let Us Bring about a Radical Improvement in Education through the Full Implementation of the Theses on Socialist Education" dated October 1, Juche 67 (1978) was marked.
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il saw many programs displayed at the 18th national program contest and exhibition early in January and gave on-the-spot guidance to Hamhung University of Medicine in May to clearly indicate the orientation and ways for the development of education.
					
					 This year witnessed that a lot of educational apparatuses and school fixtures were rendered to the educational institutions throughout the country and profound social concern was directed to education to help promote the nation's educational work.
					
					 Being aware of their duty as the professional revolutionaries, educators have devoted all their knowledge and energy to the educational work. Hundreds of teachers and researchers in educational field were awarded academic degrees and titles of academician, candidate academician, professor, doctor and associate professor this year alone and tens of thousands of model teachers have been produced in the past years.
					
					 The 9th National Program Contest in Education Field, the national students information science and technology exhibition to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK and the 16th national contest among middle schoolers marked an important occasion in training able talents and enhancing the scholarly performance of the students as a whole.
					
					 The achievements made by educators and students in international arena this year showed a glimpse of the Juche-oriented education on a higher stage of development.
					
					 Korean students proved successful at the 49th International Mathematic Olympiad in Spain, the 12th International Russian Olympic Contest of Students in Moscow and the First World Chinese Contest of Middle School Students.
					
					The Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Art Troupe was acclaimed in overseas performances including the friendship performance as a part of the Hong Kong International Chorus Festival of Youth and Children. The girl players of the DPRK football team, who were trained at various juvenile sports schools, won the FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup New Zealand 2008.
					
					 The educational development in DPRK shows well the correctness of the educational policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government and the superiority of the socialist educational system.

articles.title: U.S. Warlike Forces' Hard-line Military Policy toward DPRK Denounced
articles.content:
U.S. Warlike Forces' Hard-line Military Policy toward DPRK Denounced
Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- U.S. Congress in a recent report on the prevention of terrorism by use of nuclear, biological and chemical weapons urged the Obama government to make all efforts to deter North Korea from developing nuclear weapons, not ruling out direct actions including military measures. The report calls on the next U.S. Administration to regard it as its most important military thrust to take measures to prevent "possible terrorist acts" of the DPRK in the future.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Needless to say, the report glaringly reveals the intention of the U.S. bellicose forces to step up their hard-line military policy toward the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. seeks to justify its hegemonic policy of strength such as bolstering modern armed forces and, furthermore, escalating military actions for aggression under the pretext of the non-existent "threat of terrorism" from the DPRK.
					
					 The "military threat" from the DPRK on the lips of the U.S. bellicose forces is sheer fiction and sophism to justify their policy of aggression towards the DPRK and their reactionary "war on terrorism." The U.S. warmongers have stepped up the preparations for invading the DPRK while increasing the danger of war under the absurd pretexts of "military threat" and "southward invasion" by the DPRK for the last several decades since the ceasefire. Such moves have become evermore undisguised, gaining in new dimension under the pretext of "coping with possible terrorism" by the DPRK, since the outset of the new century.
					
					 Dialogue would help ease tension but escalated tension would only lead the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. to military conflicts. The DPRK-U.S. dialogues and the six-party talks that have been under way so far are all aimed to solve the issue through dialogue, not through confrontation. The prospect of the DPRK-U.S. relations will entirely depend on the U.S. attitude.
					
					 Should the U.S. warmongers continue pushing the DPRK-U.S. stand-off to an extreme phase, instead of rolling back their hostile policy to stifle the DPRK, this will only result in creating a situation unfavorable for the U.S.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Confrontation Sophism Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Confrontation Sophism Slammed
Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, So Jae Jin, director of the Institute for Unification Studies in south Korea, slandered the just measure of the DPRK, which was taken against the Lee Myung Bak regime's vicious rackets of confrontation, as "stereotyped tactics for stirring up crisis", claiming that the measure has deteriorated the north-south relations.
					 His groundless vituperation is no more than poor sophism as it was intended to shirk off the blame for having bedeviled the inter-Korean relations and divert elsewhere the attention of the angry people at home and abroad, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed commentary.
					
					 Disclosing the crimes committed by So Jae Jin in a bid to deteriorate the inter-Korean relations, the commentary denounces him as an unpardonable chief culprit who pushed the inter-Korean relations into catastrophic crisis in collusion with traitor Lee.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is self-evident truth that the inter-Korean relations could not but be put into crisis as Lee is foolishly pursuing the "policy towards the north" in reliance on those calling for anti-reunification and confrontation.
					
					 Therefore, if such anti-reunification traitors as So Jae Jin are still allowed to insist on the inter-Korean confrontation, the north-south relations will never be improved any time and, finally, be pushed into total collapse. So Jae Jin, a filth of the era and distress to the inter-Korean relations, and the like should be immediately removed for the reconciliation, unity and reunification of the nation.
					
					 If traitor Lee continues to depend on such confrontation maniacs as So Jae Jin, instead of drawing lesson from the present serious situation, this will only bring their destruction in the end.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Policy of Confrontation with DPRK Bound to Go Bust
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Policy of Confrontation with DPRK Bound to Go Bust
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak clique of traitors' policy of confrontation with the north is bound to go bust as it is an anti-reunification one quite contrary to the trend of the times and the wishes of the fellow countrymen.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					
					The present era is the era of national independence and unity in which the Koreans are working hard to achieve national reunification and prosperity under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					However, the Lee group of south Korea is desperately swimming against the trend of the times toward independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					The group's above-said reckless moves for confrontation are bringing the inter-Korean relations back to those in the past era of confrontation and throwing manifold difficulties and obstacles in the Koreans' way of achieving reunification.
					
					But, nothing can arrest the cause of independent reunification, peace and prosperity as it is just and the trend of the times.
					
					It is the undeniable truth that the popular masses' struggle to carve out their independent destiny is sure to make steady progress, despite temporary turns and twist and difficulties.
					
					 All the Koreans aspire after reunification and call for national reconciliation and unity as they have undergone the tragedy of national division imposed upon them by foreign forces for over half a century.
					
					 Nothing is graver than perpetuating the national split and escalating inter-Korean confrontation, quelling the people's desire for reunification in the present times.
					
					 No fascist dictator in south Korea could dampen the south Koreans' growing will and desire for national independence and reunification.
					
					 The present ruling crisis of the Lee regime is entirely attributable to the treacherous crimes it has committed by challenging the desire of the people, opposed to the independence and reunification of the nation.
					
					 The Lee group will be forced to pay a dear price for its anachronistic and treacherous racket of confrontation with the north.

articles.title: Full Play to Comradeship Called for
articles.content:
Full Play to Comradeship Called for
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The year 2008 is a year which recorded a new inerasable page in the DPRK's history of noble comradeship.
					 The might of the comradely unity has been a source of all the victories achieved despite the rapidly changing situation and manifold difficulties.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a jointly signed article.
					
					The society of the DPRK is characterized by noble revolutionary comradeship, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Noble comradeship is now in full bloom throughout the country because the Korean revolution has traversed an untrodden path called Songun.
					
					 The history of this comradeship began in the Korean revolution under the banner of Songun.
					
					The start of the Songun revolution meant the beginning of the history of comradeship and the development of the Songun revolution in depth signified the inheritance and development of comradeship.
					
					 The era of Songun, a new era of Juche-oriented revolution, recorded a new page in the history of comradeship.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary comradeship represents the truest comradeship as it is free from any hypocrisy and selfishness.
					
					 It also means the comradeship shown by the most dedicated revolutionary out of his transparent self-sacrificing spirit.
					
					 The spirit of devotedly defending the leader is the core of the Songun revolutionary comradeship run through with the do-or-die spirit.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary comradeship is unshakable as it does not change under any conditions and circumstances but grows stronger with the flow of time.
					
					 The unbreakable comradely unity that has grown strong under the banner of Songun serves as a main source guaranteeing a bright future of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Comradeship will always remain an eternal lifeline of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The above-mentioned comradeship serves as a fundamental cornerstone providing a sure guarantee for the idea and cause of the headquarters of the revolution.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary comradeship also serves as ideological and moral pabulum as it makes it possible to give play to the advantages of Korean-style socialism in all fields.
					
					As long as there is the most powerful weapon called Songun revolutionary comradeship, Korean-style socialism will remain indestructible and the cause of building a rich and powerful country is sure to be accomplished.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary comradeship is the most valuable legacy bequeathed by our revolutionary forerunners to posterity and the result of the ideal and desire of the Korean people, the article notes, calling on them to make a long journey of the Songun revolution to the end in the future, too, true to the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il under the uplifted banner of comradeship.

articles.title: Human Rights Declaration Issued in S. Korea
articles.content:
Human Rights Declaration Issued in S. Korea 
Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The Joint Conference of Human Rights Organizations and 13 other organizations in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Dec. 10, making public a "2008 Human Rights Declaration".
					The declaration noted that human rights have been violently abused due to the fascist dictatorship and neo-liberalist policy of the ruling forces in south Korea.
					
					The candlelight actions launched in protest against American beef import were a blow at the political power going against the will of the people, it said, and went on:
					
					Nevertheless, the Lee Myung Bak "government" is pursuing the terror-ridden politics against the people, resorting to all repressive means such as watch, arrest and detention.
					
					The people from all walks of life will not allow the present regime's tyranny but struggle to build a new society where human rights and peace are guaranteed, without yielding to any outrage.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Observed in Mexico
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Observed in Mexico
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea released bulletin No. 29 on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The bulletin edited an article titled "Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the KPA, and the cause of Songun" illustrated with a photograph of him inspecting a KPA unit.
					
					 The article said that the past 17 years were a period of a turn in which the DPRK has won victories in the battle to defend socialism and paved a wide avenue for building a great prosperous powerful nation and during which Kim Jong Il's outstanding leadership ability as a master of politics and military affairs has been fully demonstrated.
					
					 It praised Kim Jong Il for having trained the KPA as an invincible army fully prepared politically and ideologically and in military technique by paying primary attention to increasing the military capability.
					
					 The astonishing successes made in the DPRK are the precious fruition of the outstanding leadership ability of Kim Jong Il who has led the army and people along the road of victory with his rare wisdom and insight and matchless grit and iron will, pursuant to the line of giving importance to the military affairs, stressed the bulletin.

articles.title: Significant Days of DPRK Marked in Mexico
articles.content:
Significant Days of DPRK Marked in Mexico
Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the exploits performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk was held in Mexico on Dec. 4 on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st anniversary of her birth.
					Ramon Jimenez Lopez, president of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, said that Kim Jong Il has led the KPA to demonstrate its might as a powerful army strong in ideology and faith and an invincible army fully equipped with modern military technology and built so powerful war deterrent under the uplifted banner of Songun that no formidable imperialist enemy dare provoke the DPRK.
					
					Lauding Kim Jong Suk as an ardent revolutionary who dedicated herself to the Party and the leader and the liberation of the country and the victory of the revolution, he stressed that she is always alive as an eternal lifeguard of President Kim Il Sung, an anti-Japanese war hero, an outstanding political activist and a great mother of the revolution.
					
					Speakers spoke highly of the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il has performed by successfully carrying forward and developing the Songun cause of Kim Il Sung and the brilliant revolutionary life of Kim Jong Suk characterized by the transparent spirit of devotedly defending the leader, the ardent love for the people and the spirit of devoted service to the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente del director general de Orascom
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente del director general de Orascom
Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dirigiera el director general de la Compania de Telecomunicacion Orascom de Egipto, Naguib Sawiris, de visita en Corea.
					El visitante lo entrego el dia 15 al primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Il.

articles.title: Acto por inicio de servicio de comunicacion movil de 3G
articles.content:
Acto por inicio de servicio de comunicacion movil de 3G
Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 15 en esta capital el acto por el inicio del servicio de la comunicacion movil de tercera generacion por Network.
					Participaron en la ocasion el vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros, Ro Tu Chol, el ministro de Comunicaciones, Ryu Yong Sop, y otros funcionarios, los miembros de la delegacion de la Compania de Telecomunicacion Orascom de Egipto presidida por su director general Naguib Sawiris, y el embajador egipcio en Corea, Ismail Abdelrahman Ghoneim Hussein.
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y los representantes de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea.
					
					El director de la Compania de Comunicaciones de Corea, Pak Myong Chol, senalo en su discurso que el inicio de tal servicio marca un importante hito para desarrollar las comunicaciones del pais a la altura de la epoca de industria informatica.
					
					Subrayo que en la realizacion de este proyecto estan los ingentes esfuerzos hechos por el director general Naguib Sawiris por contribuir al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre Corea y Egipto.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que se fortaleceran mas las relaciones de cooperacion entre ambas companias.
					
					Acto seguido, Naguib Sawiris pronuncio un discurso de felicitacion.
					
					El subrayo que los pueblos egipcio y coreano tienen tradicion amistosa y cooperativa.
					
					Bajo la destacada guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el pueblo coreano logra grandes exitos superando las dificultades, anadio y expreso la conviccion de que en pleno acato a la direccion del Songun (priorizacion militar) del Dirigente, el pueblo coreano construira sin falta la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Terminado el acto, los participantes recorrieron el centro de servicio para los usuarios, el de telefono movil y otros lugares.
					
					Por otra parte, se concedio el mismo dia en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo una rueda de prensa con el mismo motivo.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia aumento armamentista de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia aumento armamentista de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El periodico Minju Joson difundio la vispera un comentario individual cuyo texto resumido sigue abajo:
					Los imperialistas norteamericanos planean emplazar en la region de Asia-Pacifico 3 batallones de cazas "F-22" con funciones de Stealth. Por otra parte, sera ubicado pronto en la base aerea norteamericana en la isla Guam el avion no tripulado de exploracion a grandes alturas "Global Hawk". Y las fuerzas aereas de Estados Unidos se proponen a seguir colocando de modo rotativo en la misma isla los bombarderos estrategicos a larga distancia "B-1", "B-2" y "B-52".
					
					El plan del circulo militar norteamericano de emplazar concentradamente esos sofisticados medios estrategicos de ataque en sus bases militares en la region de Asia-Pacifico, que toman la Peninsula Coreana por teatro operacional, parte de su intencion de atacar preventiva y sorpresivamente a la RPDC y a los paises circunvecinos luego de consolidar en esa area las fuerzas aereas moviles de ataque.
					
					Si bien EE.UU. habla mucho de la desnuclearizacion en la Peninsula Coreana a traves del dialogo, persigue en realidad el referido modo ofensivo contra la RPDC y acelera para este fin el aumento armamentista detras de la cortina del dialogo.
					
					Tales maniobras de EE.UU. resultan un acto criminal nunca perdonable que entenebrece las perspectivas de la solucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana, fomenta en ella la confrontacion y la tension militares y lleva la situacion al borde de la guerra. Ademas, resultan la prueba de que este imperio es el factor principal que impide la desnuclearizacion de dicha Peninsula y busca la segunda guerra coreana.
					
					Frente a las cada dia mas abiertas maniobras de las fuerzas belicistas de EE.UU. para agredir a la RPDC, el pueblo coreano consolidara su disuasivo de guerra de caracter autodefensivo bajo la bandera del Songun (priorizacion militar) y frustrara con fuertes contramedidas cualquier provocacion de los enemigos.
					
					Los belicistas yanquis deben actuar con prudencia al meditar las catastroficas consecuencias que traera su imprudente aumento armamentista.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun refuta sofisteria de la banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun refuta sofisteria de la banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el presidente del "Instituto de Reunificacion" del Sur de Corea, So Jae Jin, dijo que las relaciones con la RPDC se empeoraron debido a la medida sobre el paso por la linea de demarcacion militar, tomada por ella frente a la brutal campana de confrontacion del "poder" de Lee Myung Bak, calificandola de "tactica rutinaria para generar la crisis".
					Tal sofisma barato de So persigue el objetivo de eludir la responsabilidad criminal por la ruptura de las relaciones Norte-Sur y distraer la mirada de odio que acosa a la horda de Lee dentro y fuera del pais.
					
					Asi senala el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este lunes y continua:
					
					Hay de sobra los datos sobre los crimenes de So Jae Jin, uno de los imperdonables responsables que en complicidad con Lee Myung Bak llevaron a la coyuntura catastrofica las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Esta crisis de las relaciones Norte-Sur es inevitable porque Lee intenta realizar su "politica sobre el Norte" con el apoyo de los elementos opositores a la reunificacion y partidarios de la confrontacion como So.
					
					A sacar la conclusion, mientras actuen libremente los traidores anti-reunificacion de la calana de So que persiguen obstinadamente la confrontacion con el Norte, las relaciones intercoreanas no se mejoraran nunca y se daran a la ruptura total.
					
					Estos tipejos residuales de la epoca y problematicos para las relaciones intercoreanas deben ser eliminados ahora mismo para la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Si Lee Myung Bak sigue amparando a esos maniacos de confrontacion en lugar de sacar la leccion de la critica situacion de hoy, sera arruinado finalmente.
